repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu AS BASE
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -yy curl unzip build-essential zlib1g-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
WORKDIR "/opt"
RUN curl -f -sLO https://github.com/oracle/graal/releases/download/vm-19.0.2/graalvm-ce-linux-amd64-19.0.2.tar.gz
RUN tar -xzf graalvm-ce-linux-amd64-19.0.2.tar.gz && rm graalvm-ce-linux-amd64-19.0.2.tar.gz
ENV GRAALVM_HOME="/opt/graalvm-ce-19.0.2"
ENV JAVA_HOME="/opt/graalvm-ce-19.0.2/bin"
ENV PATH="$PATH:$JAVA_HOME"
RUN curl -f -sLO https://download.clojure.org/install/linux-install-1.10.0.442.sh
RUN chmod +x linux-install-1.10.0.442.sh
RUN ./linux-install-1.10.0.442.sh
COPY deps.edn .
COPY src src
COPY resources resources
COPY reflection.json .
RUN clojure -Spath
COPY script/compile .
RUN ./compile
RUN cp clj-kondo /usr/local/bin
FROM alpine:3.9
# See https://github.com/sgerrand/alpine-pkg-glibc
RUN apk --no-cache add ca-certificates curl
RUN curl -f -o /etc/apk/keys/sgerrand.rsa.pub -sL https://alpine-pkgs.sgerrand.com/sgerrand.rsa.pub
RUN curl -f -sLO https://github.com/sgerrand/alpine-pkg-glibc/releases/download/2.29-r0/glibc-2.29-r0.apk
RUN apk add --no-cache glibc-2.29-r0.apk
COPY --from=BASE /usr/local/bin/clj-kondo /usr/local/bin
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH /lib
CMD ["clj-kondo"]
